description: Since driver.init_host() isn't called, the SNAT chains are not configured, causing failures later, when SNAT rules are applied.
title: driver.init_host() is not called when using flatdhcp driver

comments.content: Since driver.init_host() isn't called, the SNAT chains are not configured, causing failures later, when SNAT rules are applied.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane
